message.content: Use the get_fact tool for both 'cactus' and 'swift', then summarize both facts.
{"name":"get_fact","content":"Cacti store water in thick stems to survive arid climates."}
{"name":"get_fact","content":"Swift is a type-safe language that emphasizes expressive syntax and performance."}

The cactus stores water in thick stems to survive arid climates, while Swift is a type-safe language known for expressive syntax and high performance. Both facts highlight unique adaptive traits—one biological, the other computational—and illustrate how systems (living or technological) evolve specialized features to thrive in their environments.
